AboutMe:
Web developer in PHP and related technologies, with a flair for written / spoken communication.

I am your typical 'OCD perfectionist programmer' (and an enthusiast writer), though experience is teaching me that shipping is more important since we are in application software, and real people / processes depend upon our coding.

Very interested in user experience, and learning / following best practices. Prefer a quiet and unobtrusive work environment.

I am a bookworm, dog-lover and a sucker for anything labeled 'best practices'!

Available at gopal1035@gmail.com, Twitter, Facebook, blog, Linkedin
